title: Drawing, "Icebergs", July 1, 1859
medium: Graphite and brush and white and green gouache on blue-green wove paper
markings: Lower left: stamp of Cooper Union Museum [Lugt 457c]
signed: Dated lower right in graphite: July 1st/59
inscribed: Insrcibed on third and fourth sketch, top row: "2" and annotated below  " 2  Blue exquisite green blue / strange supernatural"; on second sketch fourth row: "3" and annotated below "3 Exquisite opalescent blue green"
description: Sheet of graphite sketches of icebergs, each separately inscribed with notations.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Icebergs", July 1, 1859.
July 1, 1859. Graphite and brush and white and green gouache on blue-green wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-298.
